keyword: how many calories in a corona extra beer
title: How Many Calories in a Corona Extra Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a corona extra beer (148 kcal per 12 oz bottle), plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Corona Extra Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle; unopened, chilled; no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and temperature; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Corona Extra beer contains ~148 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a corona extra beer?
faqs.a: About 148 kcal in one 12 oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.9 g of carbs per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Corona Extra have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per beer.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Corona Extra beer?
Are there lower calorie Corona options?
faqs.a: Yes, Corona Light has 99 kcal per 12 oz, reducing carbs to about 5 g.
